item.description:
Come join the Things To Do Boston crew at Game On for Super Bowl XLIII


Are you a serious sports fan? The type who's more passionate than the players more knowledgeable than the coaches, and more demanding than that meddling baseball owner from New York? Do you crave a lot more than a couple of TVs, some old sports memorabilia and deep fried everything? Then you shall have it. Game On! is about the fan and for the fan.

We invite you to be our guest. Game On! is a multi-media entertainment destination where good company, great food, and the most up to date of everything come together like a 98-yard touchdown drive. With more HD projection TVs than a Best Buy showroom, better sound than Carnegie Hall, a chef vs. a fry cook, the only gamer Crib Room of its kind and Fantasy Friendly wi-fi computer access, Game On! adds up to the best fan experience yet.


There are still skyboxes available for the big game - call and book yours today! Be sure to check out the food and drink specials they have going on as well.
Football Food
Four Down's
1st down-Chips & Salsa
2nd down-Homemade Chili
3rd down-Buffalo wings
4th down-Tailgate Platter with Steak Tips, Turkey Tips, Sausage, Pork Kebabs, French Fries and Coleslaw
$100 (Feeds 4 people)
item.name: Super Bowl at Game On!
